Site_Url_desc: Publicly accessible URL of this site
Timezone_desc: Set the local timezone for date display
All_User_registration_desc: Allow users to create accounts on the login screen
default_ticket_type_desc: Default ticket type for newly created tickets
allow_public_tickets_desc: Allow the creation of tickets by users that are unregistered
show_overdue_tickets_desc: Enable/Disable flashing of tickets based on SLA time of type priority
show_overdue_tickets_tooltip: If disabled, priority SLA times will not mark tickets overdue
priorities_tooltip:
Priorities linked to this type.
Editing a priority will update all types linked
delete_ticket_type_confirm_desc: Once you delete a ticket type, there is no going back. Please be certain
ticket_priorities_desc: Ticket priorities set the level of SLAs for each ticket
mailer_desc: Preferences to send email notifications to users
mailer_check_desc: Trudesk will periodically check a mailbox for emails to convert to tickets. (Over IMAP) - Settings are applied after server restart
create_account_desc: Create a user account if account does not exist
mailer_check_delete_message_desc: Delete email message from INBOX once processed?
tps_desc: Trudesk Push Server authentication for push notifications
privacy_policy_desc: Paste in HTML / Text of your privacy policy
Site_Title_desc: Title of site. Used as page title. default: Trudesk
